synthesis method: Dissolving 0.338 g (0.13 mmol) Na9[A-PW9O34]·7H2O, 0.108 g (0.65 mmol) CH3COOAg, and 0.121 g (1.75 mmol) 1,2,4-triazole in 10 ml of distilled water at room temperature.
Adjusting the pH value of the mixture to about 7.3 with 2.0 M NaOH.
Placing the suspension into a Teflon-lined autoclave and keeping it under autogenous pressure at 160°C for 4 days.
Slowly cooling to room temperature for another 4 days.
time: 4 days at 160 °C and 4 days of cooling
product: High purity and slight green octahedral crystals
